column1: Their Lordships have further added that;

column2: "It would  be  difficult  in  some  cases  to  positively establish  that  the
deceased  was  last  seen  with  the  accused  when  there  is  a long  gap

column1: and  possibility  of other  persons  coming  in  between  exits.

column2: absence  of any  other positive  evidence  to  conclude  that  the  accused
and  the  deceased  were  last  seen  together,  it would  be  hazardous  to

column1: come  to a conclusion of guilt on  those cases."
